alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Quay County; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 11 at 3:46PM MDT until May 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Guadalupe County, Quay County, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Eastern San Miguel County, Northeast Highlands, and Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Quay County; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
